TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Test whether the Producer/Provider is able to create and update a CBRNEquipment Sub-Type and the Consumers/Receivers are able to understand (and display) it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: The Producer creates a CBRNEquipment Sub-Type with values for all attributes. The Consumers receive the information and interpret it correctly. The Producer updates this CBRNEquipment with new values for all attributes, specifically for the Sub-Type. The Consumers receive the information and interpret it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The Producer/Provider has created a topic which includes message elements belonging to the Equipment message schema area. The Consumers have subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the CBRN Equipment is processed and interpreted correctly on all Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction:
The Producer (A) creates a CBRNEquipment Sub-Type (BiologicalIntegratedDetector for instance) with name XXX_CBRNEQU_5604 and with values for all possible attributes
Notices: XXX in name of the object is meant (in principle) to be replaced by the 3 letter code of the country name. Example for the name of the Organisation: ITA_OR_001
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers (B) receive and display the CBRNEquipment correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The Producer (A) updates the CBRNEquipment with new values for all possible attributes, specifically its Sub-Type (to RadiationSpectrometer for instance).
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers (B) receive and display the CBRNEquipment correctly.
